name: tomorrow_night_nineties
title: Tomorrow Night Nineties
description: My first theme, I just wanted to tweak some colors in Tomorrow Night Eighties, but I ended up remaking the color scheme. My goal is to make it easier to relate HTML and Javascript elements while coding.
author: CMYKpixels <julien.alsina@gmail.com> (http://github.com/CMYKpixels)
keywords: dark, theme, tomorrow, night, nineties, colorful, readability, easy, eyes, javascript, html, css, sass, eighties
